content: for the other wing spike sew the wing spike to the highest part of each wing pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin when sewing the wings to the body i wrapped the orange thread around multiple times so no teal yarn showed feet use yellow yarn round 1 chain 4 1 turning chain round 2 work in top leg of the chain stitches 3 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in last chain 2 single_crochet on the other side legs catching the starting tail while you work increase in the last leg/chain 10 switch to orange yarn round 3 increase 2 single_crochet 3 increase 2 single_crochet 2 increase 16 round 4 16 single_crochet working in the back loops round 5 16 single_crochet round 6 decrease 2 single_crochet 3 decrease 2 single_crochet 2 decrease finish off and leave a long tail and add a small amount of stuffing sew the legs of the stitches together with the long tail you can use this long tail to sew the feet to the legs of the pokemon repeat for the other foot pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin legs/hips use orange yarn round 1 6 single_crochet magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 round 4 18 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 round 6 12 single_crochet fill with a small amount of stuffing underfill so it still squishes round 7 decrease x 6 6 round 8 6 single_crochet round 9 finish off leaving a long tail sew opening closed by threading tapestry needle though all 6 single_crochet outer legs repeat for the other leg/hip and sew to feet you can use a long tail from the leg/hip or from the feet pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin feet claws row 1 2 single_crochet and 1 turning chain row 2 decrease finish off leaving long tail repeat until you have 6 claws sew claws to feet with long tails sew legs and feet to body using some spare orange yarn and attach at either side of the bottom of the body where the orange part meets the yellow tummy part see image pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin eyes use white yarn row 1 2 single_crochet 1 turning chain row 2 2 slip_stitch pull both the starting tail and the current yarn through the loop and fashion off leaving a long tail to sew to the head tighten the tails and knot them together repeat with other eye sew to the head with the long tails on either side with the knotted point at the front crease between the top dome and bottom oval see image use teal yarn to sew three wraps of yarn to the front of each eye hiding tails in the head pokeball to charzard reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin nose take some back yarn and separate the 4 threads into two use the twist of two strands
